line: The Troubles of Biddy

COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: "Oh dear," sighed old Biddy, just under her breath,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: "I really am troubled and worried to death!

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: For months I have thought of a family, dear,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: To gladden my heart, and to live with me here.

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: "But daily I find that my plans are upset,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: And all I can do is to sit here and fret--

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: I haven't a sign of an egg in my nest,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: Though some I have laid are as good as the best.

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: "I scolded last night when my mistress came near,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: But though she was bitten, she seemed not to fear;

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: She only said, 'Biddy, what are you about?'

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: And then through the doorway she simply passed out.

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: [Illustration: {Girl gathering eggs.}]

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: "I don't understand it; I cannot see why;

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: For surely to be a good mother I'd try;

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: Although I would see that they did as I said!"

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: And Biddy, in sorrow and grief hung her head.

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: [Illustration: {Girl with eggs next to nest.}]

COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: [Illustration: {Girl placing eggs in nest.}]

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: So deep was the longing of poor Biddy's heart,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: She felt that with life she was ready to part;

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: But glancing about in her trouble and pain

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: She saw that her mistress was coming again;

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: And noting the basket she held in her hand

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: Old Biddy thought quickly "she can't understand,"

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: And "what is she doing?" exclaimed in surprise;

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: For out of the nest Biddy felt herself rise.

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: As Biddy stood resting her poor weary legs,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: She saw that the basket contained shining eggs;

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: And mistress with care placed them all in the nest

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: For Biddy to snuggle beneath her warm breast.

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: Now Biddy was happy; her burden was gone,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: Her troubles had vanished, she felt she had none:

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: And, planning away in her little straw bed,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: No thoughts of complaining came into her head.

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: [Illustration: {Girl feeding hen in nest.}]

line: [Illustration: {Shed.}]

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: She looked from the window each morning at dawn,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: And pictures of rapture were constantly drawn,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: For, out on the lawn near a little old shed,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: Were dishes and troughs where the chickens were fed.

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: And Biddy thought wisely, "These things I shall use;

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: The largest and neatest are what I shall choose."

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: But never a thought did this wise mother take

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: Of danger, or trouble, in St. Mary's lake.

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: How happy she was when the first sounds were heard,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: And the bright downy heads her soft feathers stirred!

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: "But what is the matter with each little nose?"

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: She said in amazement, "And what ails their toes?"

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: "They are not like chickens at all, I am sure!

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: I wonder whatever such strange things will cure?"

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: And Biddy once more was in trouble most deep;

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: For none of her children could really say peep.

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"

line: [Illustration: {Girl pumps water into pond for ducklings.}]

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: "I think that my babes for a walk ought to go;"

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: One morning said Biddy, "I'll lead them just so;

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: I'll watch every minute lest danger arise:

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: For they'll not be safe when from under my eyes."

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: At the word every downy ball hustled about,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: And ere Biddy knew it, they all had jumped out

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: Of the nest, and were darting about in the sun,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: For bugs, and for grass blades, and simply for fun.

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: Biddy watched for a time and then softly said,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: "I ought to be dusting my feathers and head;"

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: So off to the roadside she hastily went,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: And there in the soft sand, a few moments spent.

COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: What was it made Biddy's heart quiver and leap?

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: It wasn't the sound of a young chicken's peep--

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: But the splashing of water and flutt'ring of wings--

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: And leaving the road side she screamed, "Of all things!"

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: Her babies were all in the watering trough,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: Regardless of sickness, disease, and of cough.

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: "Oh dear," cried poor Biddy, "What now shall I do?

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: My children will drown and before my eyes too!"

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: And mistress cried, "Biddy, now please don't you fear,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: They simply _love_ water, and oh! aren't they dear?

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: I'll keep them all safe, so Biddy go 'way!

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: And let your poor children have freedom to play."

line: While Biddy would search for them, clucking for hours

line: Over the barnyard and in 'mong the flowers.

line: The little log barn was a refuge at night

line: Where often poor Biddy for courage would fight;

line: And there, with her feathers above her young brood,

line: She tried to instruct them in ways to be good.

line: Where apples were juicy and mellow, one day,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: These ten naughty children were gathered to play,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: When suddenly one of them, leading the band,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: Said, "Come, let us travel," and there a trip planned.

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: So off they all went toward the shed and the pump,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: Turning out now and then for a log or a stump,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: And down the steep hill where the clover bloomed bright

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: The little band wandered in perfect delight.

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: The moment that Biddy discovered the plot

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: She rushed in confusion and soon reached the spot;

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: "Oh children, be careful!" she screamed in alarm;

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: "In the lake I'm sure you will meet with some harm!"

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: But to cry, and protest, and urge them to come

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: Seemed all of no use, for they would not go home.

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: And Biddy exclaimed to herself in disgust,

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: "To stand this I cannot, and leave them I must!"

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: The evening shades gathered that night in the sky;

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: The wind sung most softly a sweet lula-by;

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: But Biddy had left her dear children alone:

Poem Title: COPYRIGHT 1917 BY STECHER LITHO. CO., ROCHESTER, N. Y. "MADE IN USA"
line: She found they were ducklings, and such could not own.
